Headline: #70 Division Temporary Reroute at Division/Cicero
ShortDescription: 70 Division buses are temporarily in both directions rerouted via Division, Kostner Augusta, Cicero and Division due to police activity near Division/Cicero.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#70 Division buses are temporarily in both directions rerouted via Division, Kostner Augusta, Cicero and Division due to police activity near Division/Cicero.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #62 Archer Temporary Reroute near Michigan/Wacker
ShortDescription: 62 Archer rr NB via Dearborn, Randolph, Clark, then Layover; SB via Clark, Washington, State, then resume normal route, due to blockage near Michigan/Wacker.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#62 Archer buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage near Michigan/Wacker.

Northbound buses will operate via Dearborn, Randolph, Clark, then Layover.

Southbound buses will operate via Clark, Washington, State, then resume their normal route.

Allow extra travel time.
